key.title: Key
key.description: Key used to identify the attachment inside the document.

code.title: Code
code.description: Code used to identify the payload of the attachment.

description.title: Description
description.description:
Details of why the attachment is being included and details on
what it contains.

url.title: URL
url.description: URL of where to find the attachment.

digest.title: Digest
digest.description:
Digest is used to verify the integrity of the attachment
when downloaded from the URL.

Attachment.description: An Attachment provides a structure to be used to attach documents inside a GOBL document, either as a reference via a URL, or directly as a base64 encoded string.
